response.original_title: Squad Five-O is Here to Stay
response.overview: Christian alternative music was at it’s all time high, and Squad Five-O was one of many bands from the scene that got drafted up to a major label. But success got to their heads, lost their way and broke up without even a “goodbye” to the fans.  In this film, you’ll experience the joy of seeing them back together, and  celebrate the new lineup re-assembled in 2017, followed by the recording of “Solid Gold”. The energy, kindness and spirit of Squad Five-O’s early days is still present, and you’ll get to experience it all.
response.tagline: All the Energy. All the Stories. All the Squad.
response.title: Squad Five-O is Here to Stay

release_dates.note: FILM WILL BE RELEASED ON VOD AFTER THEATRICAL RUN IS COMPLETE
